text: An Egyptian Mau is a small to medium cat breed. The average Egyptian Mau weighs 8-14 pounds, and grows up to 8-10 inches. This cat is a modern domestic animal. It is a mix between a Burmese and a Siamese. == Description == An Egyptian Mau has a muscular body with fur that comes in all different colors including black, bronze, smoke, silver, blue, and caramel. This catâ€™s eyes are gooseberry green, giving a worried look on its face. == References == Category:Cat breeds Category:Natural cat breeds
title: Egyptian Mau
